SEARCH
Module it.polimi.ingsw
Package it.polimi.ingsw.network.RMI

Class ClientRMI

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.network.RMI.ClientRMI
All Implemented Interfaces:
NetworkClient, RMIClientInterface, Remote
public class ClientRMI extends Object implements RMIClientInterface, NetworkClient
The ClientRMI class implements the RMIClientInterface and NetworkClient interfaces and provides the functionality for a client to communicate with a server over RMI connection. It defines methods for game actions such as login, choosing color, drawing cards etc., and sends these actions to the server. It also handles responses from the server and updates the client's view accordingly.

      RemoteException - if there is a problem with the connection.

  • Method Details

    • login

      public void login(String name)
      NetworkClient interface methods Logs in the player with the given name. This method is used to authenticate a player in the game. If the player is the first to log in, the game will ask for the number of players. If the player is not the first to log in, the game will wait for the lobby to be ready.
      Specified by:
      login in interface NetworkClient
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the player.

    • insertNumberOfPlayers

      public void insertNumberOfPlayers(int numberOfPlayers)
      NetworkClient interface methods Inserts the number of players in the game. This method is used to set the number of players that will participate in the game.
      Specified by:
      insertNumberOfPlayers in interface NetworkClient
      Parameters:
      numberOfPlayers - The number of players.

      Parameters:

      Parameters:

    • chooseSecretObjectiveCard

      public void chooseSecretObjectiveCard(int indexCard)
      NetworkClient interface methods Chooses the secret objective card for the player. This method is used to set the secret objective card of the player in the game. It is typically called at the start of the game setup.
      Specified by:
      chooseSecretObjectiveCard in interface NetworkClient
      Parameters:

    • playCard

      public void playCard(int indexHand, Point position, boolean side)
      NetworkClient interface methods Plays a card from the player's hand. This method is used to play a card from the player's hand onto the game table. It takes three parameters: the index of the card in the player's hand, the position on the table where the card will be placed, and the side of the card.
      Specified by:
      playCard in interface NetworkClient
      Parameters:
      indexHand - The index of the card in the player's hand.
      position - The position on the table where the card will be placed.
      side - The side of the card.

    • drawCard

      public void drawCard(String nickname, boolean gold, int onTableOrDeck)
      NetworkClient interface methods Draws a card for the player. This method is used to draw a card for the player. It takes three parameters: the nickname of the player, a boolean indicating whether the card is gold, and an integer indicating whether the card is drawn from the table or the deck(-1 deck, o or 1 for table).
      Specified by:
      drawCard in interface NetworkClient
      Parameters:
      nickname - The nickname of the player.
      gold - A boolean indicating whether the card is gold.
      onTableOrDeck - An integer indicating whether the card is drawn from the table or the deck.

    • stopWaiting

      public void stopWaiting()
      Stops the waiting phase for the client. This method is used to transition the client from a waiting phase to the color selection phase.
      Specified by:
      stopWaiting in interface RMIClientInterface

    • disconnect

      public void disconnect()
      Description copied from interface: RMIClientInterface
      This method is used to disconnect the client from the server. It is called when enough players have joined the lobby and the player cannot continue gaming.
      Specified by:
      disconnect in interface RMIClientInterface

      side - The side of the card.

    • stopGaming

      public void stopGaming() throws RemoteException
      This method is used to stop the game for the client. It is called when the client needs to stop the game, for example, when the client disconnects from the server.
      Specified by:
      stopGaming in interface RMIClientInterface
      Throws:
      RemoteException - throws a RemoteException if there is a problem with the connection.

    • isConnected

      public void isConnected() throws RemoteException
      This method is used to check if the client is still connected to the server. The server will call this method to check if the connection with the client is still active.
      Specified by:
      isConnected in interface RMIClientInterface
      Throws:
      RemoteException - throws a RemoteException if there is a problem with the connection.

    • isClientConnectedToServer

      public void isClientConnectedToServer()
      This method is used to periodically check if the client is still connected to the server. It creates a Runnable that calls the isConnected method and schedules it to run at a fixed rate. The Runnable is scheduled to run every 30 seconds.

    • loadSavedGame

      Parameters:
      game - The game to load.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - throws a RemoteException if there is a problem with the connection.
